接口 edu.ftp.client.logging.StreamLogging

  • 所有已知实现类:
    edu.ftp.client.ControlSocket, edu.ftp.client.DataSocket, edu.ftp.client.FTPClient, edu.ftp.client.FTPPath
    public interface edu.ftp.client.logging.StreamLogging
    Stream Logger for all implemented classes. Using ConsoleHandler by default.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      static java.util.logging.Logger logger  

    • 方法概要

      静态方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static void addLogHandler​(java.io.OutputStream outStream, java.util.logging.Formatter formatter)
      Add handler for edu.ftp.client.logging.StreamLogging interface.

    • 字段详细资料

      • logger

        static final java.util.logging.Logger logger

    • 方法详细资料

      • addLogHandler

        static void addLogHandler​(java.io.OutputStream outStream,
                          java.util.logging.Formatter formatter)
        Add handler for edu.ftp.client.logging.StreamLogging interface.
        参数:
        outStream - output stream for logger
        formatter - formatter for log handler, using SimpleFormatter if null is given.
